title: Pixel 2: After Update to Android 11 the Pixel Launcher repeateadly crashes (even in safe mode)
content:
Yesterday the update to Android 11 was installed on my 2.5 years old Pixel 2. The launcher started repeatedly crashing.

After a factory reset it seemed to be stable. Then I configured the apps I used to use and the issue re-appeared.

But, what makes me nervous, even in safe mode the launcher crashes now.

Any good idea except not using the phone anymore (because w/o the apps I used to use before the phone is nearly useless.)
